description.zh-cn: 春秋时期鲁国第二十六任君主。在位期间，鲁国大权被三桓世家实际控制，他试图恢复君主权力但与三桓冲突加剧，最终失败并流亡越国。
description.en: The 26th ruler of the State of Lu during the Spring and Autumn period. During his reign, state power was effectively controlled by the Three Huan families. He attempted to restore monarchical authority, which led to intensified conflict with the Three Huan, ultimately resulting in his failure and exile to the State of Yue.

description.zh-cn: 中国春秋时期的诸侯国。
description.en: A vassal state in China during the Spring and Autumn period.

description.zh-cn: 鲁国君主，鲁哀公之父。
description.en: Ruler of the State of Lu and father of Duke Ai of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期鲁国实际把持政权的季孙氏、叔孙氏、孟孙氏（仲孙氏）三家卿大夫家族。
description.en: The three ministerial families of Jisun, Shusun, and Mengsun (Zhongsun) that effectively controlled the government of the State of Lu during the Spring and Autumn period.

description.zh-cn: 中国春秋时期的诸侯国，鲁哀公的流亡地。
description.en: A vassal state in China during the Spring and Autumn period, where Duke Ai of Lu went into exile.

description.zh-cn: 中国春秋时期的诸侯国，鲁哀公流亡途中所经之地。
description.en: A vassal state in China during the Spring and Autumn period, which Duke Ai of Lu passed through during his exile.

description.zh-cn: 鲁哀公在位期间执政的士大夫。
description.en: A governing minister during the reign of Duke Ai of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 鲁哀公在位期间执政的士大夫。
description.en: A governing minister during the reign of Duke Ai of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 鲁哀公在位期间执政的士大夫。
description.en: A governing minister during the reign of Duke Ai of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 鲁哀公在位期间执政的士大夫。
description.en: A governing minister during the reign of Duke Ai of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 鲁哀公在位期间执政的士大夫。
description.en: A governing minister during the reign of Duke Ai of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 鲁哀公在位期间执政的士大夫。
description.en: A governing minister during the reign of Duke Ai of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 鲁哀公之子与继承人。
description.en: Son and successor of Duke Ai of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 鲁哀公之子。
description.en: Son of Duke Ai of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 鲁哀公之子。
description.en: Son of Duke Ai of Lu.

description.zh-cn: 中国东周前半段时期，鲁哀公生活于此期间。
description.en: The first half of the Eastern Zhou dynasty in China, during which Duke Ai of Lu lived.

description.zh-cn: 鲁哀公是鲁国第二十六任君主，在位27年。
description.en: Duke Ai of Lu was the 26th monarch of the State of Lu, reigning for 27 years.

description.zh-cn: 鲁哀公在位时，鲁国大权被三桓把持。鲁哀公试图恢复君主权力，但与三桓冲突加剧，最终导致其流亡国外。
description.en: During the reign of Duke Ai, the power of the State of Lu was held by the Three Huan. Duke Ai attempted to restore monarchical authority, but this intensified the conflict with the Three Huan, eventually leading to his exile.

description.zh-cn: 因与三桓的权力斗争失败，鲁哀公流亡至越国。
description.en: Due to losing the power struggle against the Three Huan, Duke Ai of Lu went into exile in the State of Yue.

description.zh-cn: 鲁哀公在流亡越国的途中经过了邾国。
description.en: Duke Ai of Lu passed through the State of Zhu on his way to exile in the State of Yue.

description.zh-cn: 在鲁哀公时期担任鲁国执政士大夫。
description.en: Served as a governing minister of the State of Lu during the period of Duke Ai.

description.zh-cn: 在鲁哀公时期担任鲁国执政士大夫。
description.en: Served as a governing minister of the State of Lu during the period of Duke Ai.

description.zh-cn: 在鲁哀公时期担任鲁国执政士大夫。
description.en: Served as a governing minister of the State of Lu during the period of Duke Ai.

description.zh-cn: 在鲁哀公时期担任鲁国执政士大夫。
description.en: Served as a governing minister of the State of Lu during the period of Duke Ai.

description.zh-cn: 在鲁哀公时期担任鲁国执政士大夫。
description.en: Served as a governing minister of the State of Lu during the period of Duke Ai.

description.zh-cn: 在鲁哀公时期担任鲁国执政士大夫。
description.en: Served as a governing minister of the State of Lu during the period of Duke Ai.
